alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 10:20AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Tuscaloosa, Pickens, northwestern Greene and northwestern Sumter Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1020 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Garden to near Electric Mills. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Gordo, Carrollton, Pickensville, Boligee, Union, Gainesville, Emelle, Memphis, McMullen, Panola, West Greene, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Bevill Lock And Dam, Garden, New West Greene, Mantua, Allison and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
